scripts.deploy:authorizer: cd .aws-sam/build/Authorizer/ && bestzip app.zip * && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name sample-authorizer --zip-file fileb://app.zip --profile lambda-project-sample --no-cli-pager
scripts.deploy:service1: cd .aws-sam/build/Service1/ && bestzip app.zip * && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name sample-service1 --zip-file fileb://app.zip --profile lambda-project-sample --no-cli-pager
